snippet.title: Persona 4 Gameboy demake Trailer
snippet.description:
EXPERIENCE THE HIT CLASSIC JRPG SERIES NOW ON THE GAMEBOY!

Persona 4 now comes to gameboy systems with this reimagining of a hit classic! Experience what it's like to roam the streets of inaba (or at least parts of it) on the small screen, and with considerably worse graphics!  I hope you enjoy this fun little project that I had worked on over a year ago, and who knows, maybe I'll post some updates in the future! (maybe even follow my itch or twitter to find out wink wink nudge nudge)

Edited by my friend Noah

PLAY THE GAME: https://seanss.itch.io/persona-4-gb-demo

If you wish to follow me, my socials are:
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/seansslive
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/SeanSS_twt
ITCH: http://seanss.itch.io
